特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
Face to face, but Google Classroom will be the LMS. Students will need a Gmail account.

Students will develop their English listening, speaking, reading, writing, vocabulary, and academic study skills through inside/ outside of class activities over the course of the semester. In class, students can expect to learn through lectures, discussions, pair, and group work, and textbook activities. Homework assignments reinforce learning from class, and will often be used in later classes. End of unit projects will require students to do group planning, research, and presentation. Students should expect an all English environment.
